steps.title: Protocol: IMMORTALITY
steps.details:
If you go offline permanently today, your digital wealth and memories are encrypted forever. To the primitive world, this is 'loss'. To us, it is 'data inefficiency'.

This protocol establishes a 'Break-Glass' mechanism for your trusted executor.

steps.title: The Asset Sweep
steps.details: You have 5 minutes. Do not list passwords. List LOCATIONS. Where does the value live? (e.g., Coinbase, Chase Bank, Google Photos, Ledger Nano).

steps.title: Select Access Vector
steps.details: How will your Executor penetrate your security layer? Choose your current infrastructure.

steps.title: Protocol: Emergency Kit
steps.details: Most advanced managers (1Password, Bitwarden) support 'Emergency Access' or 'Emergency Kits'.

subItems.text: Designate Trusted Contact in App Settings

steps.title: Protocol: Dead Drop
steps.details: You rely on physical security. You must create a Master Access Document.

subItems.text: Write Master Password + 2FA Backup Codes on archival paper
Store in Fireproof Safe or Bank Deposit Box

steps.title: The Executor Briefing
steps.details: The system is useless if the pilot doesn't know it exists. You must brief your Prime Designate.
steps.prompt: Enter name of Designate notified (and date)...

steps.title: System Locked
steps.details:
Your legacy is now redundant. The 'Bus Factor' has been mitigated.

Mission Complete.
